about_the_game:
Welcome to the most authentic, adrenaline-pumping military first-person shooter you've ever seen - 'With Them: Frontlines'!
Engineered with an unparalleled degree of realism, 'With Them: Frontlines' invites you to join a riveting multiplayer battlefield that brings the heat of real combat to your screen.
Experience ultra-competitive, heart-thumping multiplayer battles in this game crafted around the military veteran community. Squad up and fight alongside your tribe in a variety of game modes. Feel the thrill of epic 10v10 clashes, or sharpen your tactics in intense small squad operations. This isn't just a game; it's a high-stakes combat theater where your strategy and reflexes can spell the difference between victory and defeat!
What sets 'With Them: Frontlines' apart is its meticulous attention to detail, making it the pinnacle of military FPS games. Each weapon, from the roar of machine guns to the piercing crack of a sniper rifle, is designed to mirror its real-world counterpart. Experience the grit and the glory of modern warfare as you navigate intricate terrains and confront intelligent, adaptive enemies.
Customize your character's loadout with a comprehensive arsenal of firearms and equipment, all modeled with military precision. Learn to use each weapon's unique handling and recoil, master their strengths, and compensate for their weaknesses. We promise you, no two firefights will ever feel the same!
The game doesn't just stop at realism; it integrates innovative features that offer a unique twist. Players can earn the honor of representing their chosen veteran charity or group by unlocking in-game emblems and calling cards. This innovative function not only adds a layer of fun to the game but also helps to support real-life heroes!
'With Them: Frontlines' isn't just about high-octane action; it's about community. Assemble your squad, strategize, communicate, and execute your battle plan to clinch victory. And with regular content updates and community events, there's always a new challenge on the horizon.
So, what are you waiting for, soldier? Suit up, lock and load, and make your mark on the frontlines. Step into the boots of real-life military veterans, experience the intensity of their battles, and leave your legacy on the battlefield. The ultimate multiplayer FPS experience awaits you in 'With Them: Frontlines'!
Are you ready to answer the call?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
